Position Overview

* Assume overall legal responsibility for the running of Kangopak in accordance with South African statutory requirements.
* Responsible for Sales & Marketing function
* Member of Risk Team

Essential Job Functions

* Ensure legal compliance with all statutory requirements.
* Develop and implement an ongoing Sales & marketing initiative for Kangopak to ensure ongoing viability of Kangopak.
* Assume responsibility for the Human Resources function
* Compliance with BRCGS requirements. (Product Safety and Quality Management system).

Requirements

* B Com Degree
* Extensive manufacturing and business management exposure.
* Experience in the Flexible Packaging industry

Other Skills/Abilities

* Good interpersonal skills
* Business acumen
* Computer literacy
